




如果有两套k8s集群, 修改 conf 文件
```bash
# 查看第一个 k8s 集群 /root/.kube/config
$ /root/.kube/config
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://192.168.1.122:6443
  name: kubernetes
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes
    user: kubernetes-admin
  name: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
current-context: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: kubernetes-admin
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
    
# 查看第二个 k8s 集群 /root/.kube/config
$ vim /root/.kube/config
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://192.168.1.122:6444
  name: kubernetes
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes
    user: kubernetes-admin
  name: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
current-context: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: kubernetes-admin
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
```

合并两个 config 
```bash
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://192.168.1.122:6443
  name: kubernetes
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://192.168.1.122:6444
  name: kubernetes-new
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes
    user: kubernetes-admin
  name: k8s1
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes-new
    user: kubernetes-admin-new
  name: k8s2
current-context: k8s1
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: kubernetes-admin
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
- name: kubernetes-admin-new
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
```

切换上下文:
```bash
$ kubectl config --kubeconfig=/root/.kube/config use-context k8s2
or
$ kubectl config use-context k8s2
Switched to context "k8s2".
```

查看当前上下文
```bash
$ kubectl config current-context
k8s2
```

查看指定上下文配置信息
```bash
$ kubectl  config get-contexts k8s2
CURRENT   NAME   CLUSTER          AUTHINFO               NAMESPACE
*         k8s2   kubernetes-new   kubernetes-admin-new
```

只看当前上下文的配置信息
```bash
$ kubectl config  view --minify
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: DATA+OMITTED
    server: https://192.168.1.122:6444
  name: kubernetes-new
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes-new
    user: kubernetes-admin-new
  name: k8s2
current-context: k8s2
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: kubernetes-admin-new
  user:
    client-certificate-data: REDACTED
    client-key-data: REDACTED
```


清理 context 信息

删除用户
```bash
$ kubectl --kubeconfig=/root/.kube/config config unset users.<name>
```
删除集群
```bash
$ kubectl --kubeconfig=/root/.kube/config config unset clusters.<name>
```
删除上下文
```bash
$ kubectl --kubeconfig=/root/.kube/config config unset contexts.<name>
```
